703284f-a.title: Brooklyn: Bridge Street - Johnson Street
703284f-a.text:
Bridge Street, east side, between Johnson Street and Myrtle Ave. A
view of the clock on the old Standard Union Building, at Johnson and Gold
Streets, as seen between the Bridge Street M.E. Church and a frame building
at 303 Bridge Street.  i5 .R00EA 2: Ny120 9~7Gg. T AD. 22( 5(2 7 EN
December 10, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
703284f-a.folder: Bridge Street & Johnson Street, Brooklyn, NY

703291f-a.title: Brooklyn: Bridge Street - Johnson Street
703291f-a.text:
293 Bridge Street, at the N. E. corner of Johnson Street,
showing an old three-story brick house. The Edward Weck Building
is on Johnson Street.
October 11, 1940
P. L. Sperr
